text: there isn't a more beautiful warm
feeling than loving someone deeply until
of course you realize it's one-sided and
no matter how far away we wish to run

sometimes we're not everyone's cup of

who doesn't like us back they might just
think they're imagining that we like

happens realizing where you stand can be

sometimes the meaning of this confusing

Mark Leary explains how being the one

to reject someone nicely that's why if
your crush hopes you don't like them
romantically they might send mixed

body will tell you what you need to know
